subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Ron Artest beat the buzzer with a wild shot after rebounding Kobe Bryant’s miss, and the Lakers edged the Suns to take a 3-2 lead in the Western Conference finals.
snippet: Ron Artest beat the buzzer with a wild shot after rebounding Kobe Bryant’s miss, and the Lakers edged the Suns to take a 3-2 lead in the Western Conference finals.
